alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 30 at 12:39PM EDT until August 01 at 5:12AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, several roads around Ravenna are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 30.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting and is expected to fall below flood stage by late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM.
